original_text: Some of the crowd prompted Alexander, whom the Jews had put forward. And Alexander, motioning with his hand, wanted to make a defense to the crowd.
korean_text: 유대인들이 무리 가운데서 알렉산더를 권하여 앞으로 밀어내니 알렉산더가 손짓하며 백성에게 변명하려 하나

sentences.original_text: Some of the crowd prompted Alexander
sentences.korean_translation: 무리 중 몇 사람이 알렉산더를 권하여

sentences.original_text: whom the Jews had put forward.
And Alexander, motioning with his hand,
wanted to make a defense to the crowd.
